description: Ability to create a rules dashboard
Selected connection credentials (user names, etc) are fully displayed
Enables to start applications Metadata Explorer depends on
Write access to all connection configurations in the tenant
Basic Connection User for creating own connections
Read access to info data sources
Manage catalog, add tagging and change tagHierarchy
Shared Connections for read, write and manage
Administrate tenant. Combines access to user, policy, application management, and to connection management for the tenant.
Allows to start all applications in the tenant. Overrides any other start policies.
Access content of all connections in the tenant in Metadata Explorer.
Access content of the user's own connections in Metadata Explorer.
Selected connection credential fields like user names are fully displayed.
Read access to all connection definitions in the tenant.
Write access to all connection definitions in the tenant.
Read access to the user's own connection definitions.
Write access to the user's own connection definitions.
Working with Pipeline Modeler. Allows to start the Modeler and to manage connections.
Member of tenant. Gives access to connection management to configure their own connections. Needs additional application start policies for running apps.

DEPRECATED. Use app.datahub-app-data.fullAccess instead. Working with Metadata Explorer. Allows to start the Metadata Explorer and to manage connections. For some role in the Metadata Explorer, permission to start the Pipeline Modeler might also be needed.
DEPRECATED. app.datahub-app-data.fullAccess is a close replacement. Start Metadata Explorer
Stop application instances started by any other user. Allows a user to stop even applications owned by an admin.

Access the system management and policy management. This policy is nested in the sap.dh.admin policy and provides most permissions. vSystem APIs grant full tenant-wide access to users with this policy.
